name: SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories
overview: In SPY×ANYA: Operation Memories, an adventure video game based on the hit manga series SPY × FAMILY, you control Anya Forger as she works with her family on her school project: a photo diary. On weekdays, she'll go to school and come home to her family in the afternoon. On weekends, Anya can go to exciting places such as an art museum or the beach to find topics to take photos of and add to the collection. Players can also play mini-games from the anime and originally designed for the game. They can also choose outfits, accessories, and hairstyles for Anya, Loid, Yor, and Bond through a wardrobe of over 80 items.
